title: Sidewall, 1940–45
creditline: Gift of A.L. Diament and Co.
description: A reproduction of a French wallpaper by Zuber. A large bouquet of white roses held together with a chain of small red roses tied in a bow with flowing streamers. Small branches of a single whiteroses are scattered about top and bottom of drop repeat. On both margins is a vertical redorte of intertwined rose stems with blossoms at point of intersection. In the style of first quarter of 20th century. Printed in white, gray, red, green,orange and black on gold field.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1940–45.
1940–45. Screen printed. Gift of A.L. Diament and Co.. 1946-98-6.
